title: A tryal of skill, performed by a poor decayed gentlewoman, who cheated a rich grasier of sevenscore pound, and left him a child to keep. If you will know, then listen a while, and you shall know that which will make you smile. The tune is, Ragged and torn.
publisher: Printed for I[ohn]. Wright, I[ohn]. Clarke, W[illiam]. Thackeray, and T[homas]. Passinger.,
